basics.name: Nathan Getchel
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Astrophysics in the College of Natural Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I am also pursuing a B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
education.area: B.S. Astrophysics, B.A. Information and Computer Sciences
